mapper.select: SELECT count(*) cnt FROM orders WHERE TO_CHAR(ord_date, 'yy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')

SELECT cart_saleprice
+ p.pro_add_price
FROM cart
,(SELECT pro_add_price FROM pro_add_option where no=#{pro_add_option_no}) p
WHERE member_no=#{member_no} and no=#{cart_no}

SELECT receiver_no, address_no, ord_price, ord_use_point, ( SELECT sum(ord_pro_price * ord_pro_qty) FROM orders_product op WHERE ord.no = op.ord_no) as ord_price FROM orders ord WHERE ord_id = #{ord_id}
